home.description: Hello, my name is Nontachai Prosri. I am a software developer with experience in developing fullstack web applications using React, Vue, Nuxt3, Node.js, and MySQL. I can develop and maintain both frontend and backend parts and am committed to learning new technologies to develop efficient applications that meet user needs. I hope to bring my skills to benefit your organization. üôè
